meanings.sent1: The touns in the village are colorful houses.

meanings.definition: Touns (verb): third person singular present of toun
meanings.sent1: He touns when he sees his favorite food.

meanings.sent3: The bird touns happily in the morning.
meanings.sent4: The wind touns through the trees like a whisper.
meanings.sent5: The river touns gently over the rocks.
